item.description:
What better way to celebrate the coming of spring than with a road race, beer, and Irish music?  The Doyle's Road Race is a great way to get some exercise, challenge yourself, and have some fun at the post-race bash.  (Note: Walkers are welcome!) Here are the details:

  • A fairly flat wheel-measured 5-mile course finishing at Doyle's Cafe, traveling through Franklin Park, the Gem of the Emerald Necklace.
  • Post Race Party immediately following, featuring music by The Fenian Sons, refreshments, food, award ceremony and raffle prizes. 
  • Pre-registration and early number t-shirt pick-up at Doyle's Cafe is Saturday April 9 from 2:00-7:00PM.  Pre-entry fee $25.00, postmarked by April 4, 2011. 
  • Post-entry $30.00 on the day of the race.  Registration ends at 10:30AM on race day. 
  • The first 300 registered runners will receive a 100% cotton long-sleeve t-shirt. 
  • Race numbers may be picked up at Doyle's Cafe between 8:30AM and 10:30AM on race day.  Make checks payable to Doyle's Road Race. 
  • For further information, call Doyle's Cafe at 617-524-2345.

Here's a little info about Doyle's:  http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Doyle's_Cafe

Here's Doyle's official website: http://www.doylescafeboston.com/
item.why: What better way to celebrate the coming of spring than with a road race, beer, and Irish music? The Doyle's Road Race is a great way to get some exercise, challenge yourself, and have some fun at the post-race bash. (Note: Walkers are welcome!)
item.name: Doyle's Emerald Necklace 5 Mile Road Race (& Party!!)
